purpose: Provide a comprehensive educational resource for learning about Hugging Face Agents and their applications.
principle: The course is structured using educational modules and practical examples to teach users how to build and deploy AI agents using Hugging Face technologies.
reusability: The course materials can be reused as a learning resource and reference for building AI agents. It is open-source, allowing for modification and adaptation.
limitations: The course content may require prior knowledge of AI and machine learning concepts. It is focused on Hugging Face technologies, which may limit exploration of other frameworks.
name: agents-course
description: This repository contains the Hugging Face Agents Course.
highlight: An in-depth course on building AI agents using Hugging Face technologies, featuring practical examples and educational resources.
